name: Sender
description: Sender This contract helps send Tellor's data on Ethereum to Matic's Network.

functionDecorators.name: getCurrentValue
functionDecorators.description: Allows the user to get the latest value for the requestId specified.

parameterDecorators.name: _requestId
parameterDecorators.description: is the requestId to look up the value for.

functionDecorators.name: getCurrentValueAndSend
functionDecorators.description: This function gets the current value for the specified request Id from UsingTellor.

parameterDecorators.name: _requestId
parameterDecorators.description: is Tellor's requestId to retreive the latest curent value for it.

functionDecorators.name: getDataBefore
functionDecorators.description: Allows the user to get the first value for the requestId before the specified timestamp.

parameterDecorators.name: _requestId
parameterDecorators.description: is the requestId to look up the value for.

parameterDecorators.name: _timestamp
parameterDecorators.description: before which to search for first verified value.

functionDecorators.name: getNewValueCountbyRequestId
functionDecorators.description: Counts the number of values that have been submited for the request.

functionDecorators.name: getTimestampbyRequestIDandIndex
functionDecorators.description: Gets the timestamp for the value based on their index.

parameterDecorators.name: _requestId
parameterDecorators.description: is the requestId to look up.

parameterDecorators.name: _index
parameterDecorators.description: is the value index to look up.

functionDecorators.name: isInDispute
functionDecorators.description: Gets the 5 miners who mined the value for the specified requestId/_timestamp.

parameterDecorators.name: _timestamp
parameterDecorators.description: is the timestamp to look up miners for.

functionDecorators.name: retrieveData
functionDecorators.description: Retreive value from oracle based on requestId/timestamp.

functionDecorators.name: retrieveDataAndSend
functionDecorators.description: This function gets the value for the specified request Id and timestamp from UsingTellor.

parameterDecorators.name: _timestamp
parameterDecorators.description: is Tellor's requestId timestamp to retreive.
